marytts.tools.dbselection

Interface CoverageFeatureProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseCFProvider, InMemoryCFProvider

    public interface CoverageFeatureProvider
    This interface is used to access the coverage features for a given corpus.
    Author:
    marc

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] getCoverageFeatures(int i)
      Get the i-th coverage features from this provider.
      int getID(int i)
      Get the unique ID number of the i-th sentence.
      int getNumSentences()
      Get the total number of sentences provided by this provider.

    • Method Detail

      • getNumSentences

        int getNumSentences()
        Get the total number of sentences provided by this provider.
        Returns:
        number of sentences

      • getCoverageFeatures

        byte[] getCoverageFeatures(int i)
        Get the i-th coverage features from this provider.
        Parameters:
        i - the index number of the features to retrieve.
        Returns:
        the coverage features.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if i is not in the range from 0 to getNumSentences()-1.

      • getID

        int getID(int i)
        Get the unique ID number of the i-th sentence. This may or may not be the same as i. However, it can be assumed that IDs are ordered: if i > j, getID(i) > getID(j).
        Parameters:
        i - i
        Returns:
        ID
